profile.title: Umwirondoro w‚ÄôUkoresha
profile.mustLogin: Ugomba kwinjira (signin) kugira ngo urebe amagenamiterere.
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Amasogonda mbere yo gusiba mu buryo bwikora
profile.noPrivateKey: Nta furufuro y‚Äôibanga (private key) iri kuri iyi mashini yo koherezwa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Shyiraho ijambobanga ryo kubikaho kopi y‚Äôububiko:
profile.importSuccess: Urufunguzo rw‚Äôibanga rwinjijwe kuri iyi mashini.
profile.importFailed: Kwinjiza byanze (ijambobanga si ryo cyangwa dosiye yangiritse).
profile.keysRotated: Urufunguzo rushya rwakozwe kandi urufunguzo rusangira (public) rwoherejwe.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Urufunguzo rwawe rw‚Äôibanga ntiruva kuri iyi mashini. Ohereza kopi irinzwe n‚Äôijambobanga kugira ngo uyisubize ku yindi mashini.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Uri kuri Free‚Äîkoresha amahitamo yihuse ya Sun/Moon hano hasi. Kuzamura (upgrade) kugira ngo ufungure indi myambi.
profile.backupDesc: Kora amakopi arinzwe n‚Äôijambobanga y‚Äôimfunguzo zawe, hanyuma usubize kuri indi mashini kugira ngo wihuza.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Jijisha igihe porogaramu itari yo iri ku isonga
profile.holdToReveal: Fata wongere urekure kugira ngo ubone
profile.followHint: Inkuru zabo zizagaragara mu rukurikirane rwawe rwa ‚ÄòUrimo gukurikira‚Äô nibatangaza ku bamukurikira (cyangwa Rusange).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Hari ikitagendeye neza muri iki gice.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Ohereza terefone zinjiye n‚Äôubutumwa kuri telefoni cyangwa imeri byemejwe byawe. Telefone/ubutumwa busohoka bishobora kugaragaza nimero yawe ya Chatforia.
profile.errE164: Andika nimero ya telefoni yemewe ya E.164 (urugero: +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Hitamo nibura aho kohereza (telefoni cyangwa imeri).
profile.errQuietHours: Amasaha y‚Äôituze agomba kuba hagati ya 0 na 23.

support.heading: Twagufasha dute?
support.contactIntro: Tuzagusubiza kuri imeri. Tanga ibisobanuro bidufasha kongera kubyutsa ikibazo.

chat.selectPrompt: Hitamo ubutumwa cyangwa icyumba kugira ngo utangire kuganira

status.filesNote: Dosiye kugeza kuri 5. Bimara amasaha 24 byonyine.

contactList.updateAliasFailed: Kuvugurura izina ry‚Äôinyito byanze. Ongera ugerageze.

auth.headline: Ubutumwa bwizewe, mpuzamahanga hamwe n‚Äôihindura ako kanya
auth.description: Ubumenyi bwo kurangiza ku mpera zombi (E2E), guhindura bushyigikiwe na AI, ubutumwa bushira, na terefone/video.

feature.encryption: Ubumenyi bwo kurangiza ku mpera zombi ku buryo busanzwe
feature.privacy: Ubuzima bwite mbere na mbere. Ibyo ushyiraho, ni wowe ubigenzura.

hero.sub: E2E, guhindura bushyigikiwe na AI, ubutumwa bushira, na terefone/video.

auth.desktopTip: Uri kuri mudasobwa? Skanisha telefoni yawe kugira ngo ubone porogaramu.
auth.scanHelper: Uri kuri mudasobwa? Skanisha telefoni yawe kugira ngo ubone porogaramu.
auth.subhead: Ubutumwa bwihishe, burinzwe, kandi buhindurwa ‚Äî ako kanya.
auth.tip: Inama: Koresha konti imwe kuri web na mobile. Ubutumwa bwawe burahuzwa.
auth.scanHint: Skanisha kugira ngo ukurure porogaramu cyangwa ufungure mu mushakisha.

home.title: Ahabanza
home.subheader: Ohereza ubutumwa kugira ngo utangire ikiganiro.

press.title: Itangazamakuru
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia ni porogaramu y‚Äôubutumwa ishyira ubuzima bwite imbere, yorohereza kuganira mu ndimi zitandukanye. Ubutumwa burinzwe E2E ku buryo busanzwe, kandi guhindura indimi 100+ gukorwa mu gihe nyacyo. Ukoresha ashobora gushyiraho ubutumwa bushira, gutuma kumenya ko bwasomwe kuba ku bushake, no kwihuza ku byuma byinshi. Iri kuri iOS, Android, na web.
press.scanTip: Uri kuri mudasobwa? Skanisha telefoni yawe kugira ngo ubone porogaramu.

careers.title: Akazi
careers.intro: Turi itsinda rito riri kubaka umukozi w‚Äô ubutumwa bw‚Äôisi yose. Niba witaye ku kurinda (encryption), kuboneka kuri bose, na UX ishimishije, twishimira kukumva.
careers.openRoles: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.

about.title: Ibyerekeye Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ni umukozi w‚Äôubutumwa wizewe, uvuga indimi nyinshi, ufite E2E, ihindura ako kanya, ndetse na terefone/video. Intego yacu iroroshye: gufasha abantu guhuzwa‚Äîmu mutekano, mu ibanga, no mu ndimi zose.

values.privacy: <bold>Ubuzima bwite mbere:</bold> E2E ku buryo busanzwe.
values.access: <bold>Kuboneka kuri bose:</bold> Hindura indimi 100+ mu buryo bwikora.
values.control: <bold>Igenzura:</bold> Ubutumwa bushira & kumenya ko bwasomwe ni ku bushake.
values.privacy_aria: Ubuzima bwite mbere: E2E ku buryo busanzwe.
values.access_aria: Kuboneka kuri bose: Hindura indimi 100+ mu buryo bwikora.
values.control_aria: Igenzura: Ubutumwa bushira na read receipts ni ku bushake.

about.howDescription: Ubutumwa burindwa ku mashini yawe mbere yo koherezwa. Ihindura, kopi z‚Äôumutekano, n‚Äôihuza ku byuma byakozwe ku buryo bigabanya ibyo seriveri zacu zamenya.

advertise.title: Kwiyamamaza kuri Chatforia
advertise.description: Geraho abakoresha ubutumwa bashishikaye ukoresheje imyanya y‚Äôamatangazo yizewe. Dutanga imyanya ya banner, ubufatanye bwa ‚Äòsponsorships‚Äô, n‚Äôamatangazo y‚Äôimbere mu bicapo. Abanyamuryango ba Premium ntibabona amatangazo.

adsense.withPubId: Ubu dukoresha Google AdSense. Niba wifuza kutugeraho ukoresheje Google Ads, koresha publisher ID {{pubId}} kandi usabe ‚Äòmanaged placement‚Äô ku myanya iri hasi. Hari na sponsorships zitaziguye‚Äîkoresha ifishi.
adsense.noPubId: Ubu dukoresha Google AdSense. Hari na sponsorships zitaziguye‚Äîkoresha ifishi iri hasi.

advertise.noPlacements: Nta myanya irategurwa. Yongerwa muri ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Ukoresha agaruka kenshi kandi akamara igihe mu isura y‚Äôamasomo y‚Äôibiganiro
why.brandSafe: Imiterere yizewe ku kirango; kugabanya kugaragara kenshi
why.deals: Amasezerano ataziguye cyangwa anyura kuri AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Urakoze! Ubusabe bwawe bwoherejwe. Tuzakurikirana vuba.
form.mailtoInfo: Gufungura porogaramu yawe ya email kugira ngo wohereze ubusabe‚Ä¶
form.budgetLabel: Ingengo y‚Äôimari ya buri kwezi (si ngombwa)

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Fungura paki igukwiriye: ukureho amatangazo kuri Plus, cyangwa ubone imikorere yose kuri Premium.

premiumMonthly.title: Premium (Buri kwezi)
premiumMonthly.desc: Imikorere yose, indirimbo za terefone, na AI ikomeye.

premiumAnnual.title: Premium (Buri mwaka)
premiumAnnual.desc: Bika byinshi iyo wishyuye buri mwaka.
premiumAnnual.disclaimer: Wishyura imbere. Ushobora guhagarika igihe icyo ari cyo cyose. Nta bihishe.

marketing.premiumMonthlyDesc: Imikorere yose, indirimbo za terefone, na AI ikomeye.
marketing.premiumAnnualDesc: Bika byinshi iyo wishyuye buri mwaka.
marketing.annualDisclaimer: Wishyura imbere. Ushobora guhagarika igihe icyo ari cyo cyose. Nta bihishe.

gettingStarted.title: Uko utangirira
gettingStarted.subtitle: Uri mushya kuri Chatforia? Iyi ntambwe-ngufi igaragaza iby‚Äôingenzi kugirango utangire mu minota mike.

alert.text: Uyu muyoboro uzaguka uko dushyiraho imikorere mishya. Niba hari kibura, tubibwire binyuze kuri

section2.title: 2) Tangira ubutumwa
section2.item1: Hanga DM cyangwa itsinda maze wohereze ubutumwa bwa mbere.
section2.item2: Koresha ihindura ako kanya kugira ngo uvugane mu ndimi 100+.
section2.item3: Gerageza ubutumwa bushira na read receipts muri Umwirondoro ‚Üí Ubuzima bwite.

section3.title: 3) Genda kure
section3.item2Part1: Huza ibindi byuma kandi shyiraho kopi z‚Äôumutekano muri

account.q: Nigira nte konti cyangwa ndayisubiza nte?
account.a: Kurura porogaramu cyangwa koresha web, kanda ‚ÄúFungura konti‚Äù, emeza imeri/telefoni. Gusubiza, koresha ‚ÄúWibagiwe ijambobanga‚Äù.

privacy.a: Yego. Ubutumwa na terefone birinzwe E2E ku buryo busanzwe. Ni wowe n‚Äôuwo wohereje mufite uruhushya rwo kubusoma.

translate.a: Hindura ‚ÄúAuto-translate‚Äù muri Settings ‚Üí Appearance & Language. Duhindura kuri mashini igihe bishoboka, ubundi binyura muri API zizewe n‚Äôamakuru make.

contact.a: Twandikire kuri support@chatforia.com. Shyiraho amashusho n‚Äôinshuro ya porogaramu.

intro.body: Iyi Politiki y‚ÄôUbuzima bwite isobanura uko Chatforia (‚Äútwebwe‚Äù) dukusanya, dukoresha, kandi dusangira amakuru igihe ukoresha porogaramu n‚Äôserivisi zacu. Dushyira Chatforia ku buryo gito dukenera kubona amakuru.

infoWeCollect.title: Amakuru dukusanya
infoWeCollect.account: Amakuru ya konti (nka imeri/telefoni) yo gukora no kurinda konti yawe.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ibirimo by‚Äôumutekano (ubutumwa/terefo) birinzwe E2E; ntidushobora kubisoma.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Ibyo kwitaho/ikoreshwa nko kugwa kwa porogaramu, ubwoko bw‚Äôigikoresho, cyangwa isesengura ryoroshye kugira ngo tuzamure imikorere.

howWeUse.title: Uko dukoresha amakuru
howWeUse.provide: Gutanga no kurinda serivisi (kwinjira, kurwanya spam/ihohoterwa).

sharing.title: Gusangira
sharing.body: Ntiducuruza amakuru y‚Äôabakoresha. Dushobora gusangira make n‚Äôabadufasha (nka push/isesengura) ku masezerano akomeye.

rights.title: Uburenganzira bwawe
rights.body: Bitewe n‚Äôakarere kawe (urugero GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ushobora gusaba kureba, gukosora, gusiba, cyangwa kwanga imikorere imwe. Twandikire: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kubika amakuru & umutekano
retention.body: Tubika gusa ibikenewe mu mikorere ya serivisi kandi dukoresha umutekano usanzwe mu nganda. Ibirimo bya E2E ntibishobora guseswa natwe.

children.title: Abana
children.body: Chatforia ntiyagenewe abana bari munsi ya 13 (cyangwa uko amategeko y‚Äôiwanyu abivuga).

changes.title: Impinduka
changes.body: Tuzashyira hano ibisubizo bishya kandi duhindure itariki ya ‚ÄúByavuguruwe‚Äù.

intro.body: Ukoresheje Chatforia wemeye aya mategeko. Niba utayemera, ntukoreshe serivisi.

accounts.title: Konti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Tanga amakuru nyayo kandi urinde inyandiko zawe.

acceptableUse.title: Ikoreshwa ryemewe
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Nta birimo binyuranyije n‚Äôamategeko, ihohoterwa, cyangwa byica uburenganzira; nta spam cyangwa ikoreshwa rya mashini mu buryo bubi.

yourContent.title: Ibirimo byawe
yourContent.body: Ugabana uburenganzira ku birimo byawe. Uduha uburenganzira bukenewe mu mikorere ya serivisi (urugero, kohereza, kubika, guhindura).

disclaimer.title: Ibyo twanga & Inshingano
disclaimer.body: Serivisi itangwa ‚Äòuko iri‚Äô nta birenze ibyemezo. Ku rwego rurenze rw‚Äôamategeko, Chatforia ntiyishyuza ibyavuye mu ngaruka zituruka by‚Äôinyongera.

changes.title: Impinduka
changes.body: Dushobora kuvugurura aya mategeko; gukomeza gukoresha nyuma y‚Äôimpinduka bisobanura ko wemeye.

doNotSell.title: Ntugurishe cyangwa Udasangize Amakuru Yanjye
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ntiigurisha amakuru y‚Äôabakoresha. Abanyagihugu ba California baracyashobora kohereza ibisabwa hakurikijwe CPRA bakoresheje buto iri hasi.

cookies.title: Amagenamiterere ya Cookies
cookies.body: Chatforia ikoresha cookies nke (urugero, session, umutekano). Ntidukoresha cookies z‚Äôamatangazo aturutse ahandi. Shyira imiterere ya cookies mu mushakisha wawe.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Ntibishobotse kuzana uko nimero ya telefoni ihagaze.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Nta nimero yahawe. Hitamo imwe hakurikijwe code y‚Äôakarere kugira ngo utangire kohereza ubutumwa.

startChatModal.title: Tangira ikiganiro
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Andika izina, izina ukoresha, telefoni, cyangwa imeri‚Ä¶
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Andika izina ukoresha cyangwa telefoni ubone Gushakisha.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Telefoni/imeri bizaboneka nyuma yo kubibika nka kontaki.
startChatModal.firstMessageOptional: Ubutumwa bwa mbere (si ngombwa ariko bwarushaho kuba byiza)

sounds.freeNotice: Uri kuri Free ‚Äî amajwi ya premium aragaragazwa ariko afunze. Kora upgrade kugira ngo ufungure byose.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Iyi mikorere isaba paki ya Premium.

aiSettings.title: Amagenamiterere ya AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Tunganya ihindura, ibisubizo byihuse, na ForiaBot isubiza mu buryo bwikora.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Hindura mu buryo bwikora ubutumwa bwinjira
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Ohereza ubutumwa bumaze kwakirwa vuba (bwabanje gusukurwa) kuri AI kugira ngo iguhe ibyihuse.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Hisha amagambo atihanganirwa mu bitekerezo bya AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Iyo biriho, ibisubizo bya AI bizagarura amagambo yagaragajwe ahishwe
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Hindura gusubiza mu buryo bwikora igihe nari buze
aiSettings.autoReplyMode: Uburyo bwo gusubiza mu buryo bwikora

accessibilitySettings.title: Ubufasha & Amaburira
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Amahitamo afasha gukoresha Chatforia utagombye kwishingikiriza ku ijwi.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Itangirira ku ngano isanzwe. Yongera niba ukunda inyuguti nini.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Amabendera agaragara y‚Äôubutumwa & terefone
Erekana amabendera n‚Äôimiterefoni y‚Äôumutwe kugira ngo utabura ibibaye.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vibrer ku butumwa bushya (iyo bishyigikiwe)
Shyiraho vibration ku matangazo.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Kwaka kw‚Äôuruhu ku terefone yinjira
Kwaka kumwe kw‚Äôumucyo igihe terefone iri guhamagara.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Hindura mu nyandiko mu buryo bwikora amajwi
Shyiraho inyandiko ku butumwa bw‚Äôamajwi wakiriye.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Erekana amabendera n‚Äôimiterefoni y‚Äôumutwe kugira ngo utabura.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Kwaka kumwe kw‚Äôumucyo igihe terefone iri guhamagara.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Bika gusa ‚Äòciphertext‚Äô kuri seriveri. Ibi bihagarika AI/Translate na kureba ibikubiyemo mbere yo kohereza.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Shakisha ukoresheje izina ry‚Äôinyito, izina, izina ukoresha, cyangwa telefoni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Sangiza ihuriro ryawe ry‚Äôitumiriro kugira ngo mutangire kuganira ako kanya.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Gumanya kuvugana uri mu rugendo ukoresheje Chatforia kuri iOS na Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Inama: Ubutumwa bwawe buhuza hagati ya web na mobile.

randomChat.title: Ikiganiro Kibuze ku Nteko
randomChat.description: Hura n‚Äôumuntu mushya ako kanya. Tuzaguhuza tugufungurire icyumba cy‚Äôagateganyo.
randomChat.saveGuard: Kubika birajya ku biganiro by‚Äôabantu gusa

login.title: Ikaze nanone
login.subtitle: Injira muri konti yawe ya Chatforia
login.ssoUnavailable: Single-sign-on ntiboneka ubu. Koresha izina & ijambobanga bisanzwe.

error.invalid: Izina ukoresha cyangwa ijambobanga si byo
error.unprocessable: Ibisabwa si byo. Reba izina/imeri n‚Äôijambobanga.
error.deviceLimit: Igihe cy‚Äôibyuma cyageze kuri Free. Sohoka kuri kimwe cyangwa usubire kuri Premium kugira ngo wihuza byinshi.
